message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for a price of $12000. I think it's a great deal, considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $10500. I think it's a fair compromise considering the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to be able to fit it into my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to go down to $10200, which is still a bit above your target, but I think it's a fair compromise considering the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to know you're serious about making a commitment to purchase the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9800. I'm willing to make a commitment to purchase the product, but I need to be able to fit it into my budget.

I'm starting to get close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need you to meet me halfway. I'm willing to sell the product for $10000, which is my minimum price. If you're willing to commit to purchasing it at this price, I'm willing to make the deal.
